frame.name: Speed_description
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> is in motion at a particular <fen>Speed</fen>, a momentaneous description of distance traveled per time.
<ex><fex name="Entity">The car</fex> went by <fex name="Degree">real</fex> <t>fast</t>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Entity">The car</fex> <m>is</m> <fex name="Degree">really</fex> <t>fast</t>.</ex>
<ex>Oh yeah, <fex name="Entity">Maseratis</fex> <m>are</m> <t>fast</t>! <fex name="Degree">INI</fex></ex>
<ex>The <t>speed</t> <fex name="Entity">of the car</fex> was <fex name="Speed">25 mph</fex> <fex name="Time">when it ran into the obstacle</fex>.</ex>
LUs of this frame are commonly involved in a semantic construction in which, instead of describing the current <fen>Speed</fen>, they rather describe some other <fen>Speed</fen> saliently associated with the <fen>Entity</fen>, such as maximum possible <fen>Speed</fen> of the <fen>Entity</fen> or (for an <fen>Entity</fen> used as an implement) <fen>Speed</fen> when in operation.
This construction can be defined as follows:
A phrase describing a temporary (stage-level) property (A) of an entity (B) is pumped to a phrase describing an individual-level property predicating or attributing the entity's (B's) salient association with such a property (A) under some salient conditions, especially the conditions of use of the entity. E.g., in the Temperature or Location_of_light frames:
<ex>I can never bake anything in my oven because it 's too hot.</ex> <ex>She gave him a really bright flashlight for Christmas.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Attribute
FE.definition: <def-root>The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is a function of the distance that the <fen>Entity</fen> moves in a given duration. With the adjectives of this frame this Frame Element is generally incorporated.</def-root>

FE.name: Speed
FE.definition: <def-root>A quantity or other characterization of the <fen>Entity</fen>'s speed.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the <fen>Speed</fen> from the norm.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular <fen>Speed</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Some specification of the <fen>Circumstances</fen> under which the <fen>Entity</fen> has a particular <fen>Speed</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The reason why the <fen>Entity</fen> or <fen>Attribute</fen> is ata certain speed.</def-root>
